title: Developper Full Stack
description: I started my career as a full stack developper at Sonatel Academy where I learned the basics of web development and mobile development. I worked with severals technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript, PHP, MySQL, Angular, Ionic, Flutter, Laravel, UML, Figma, Trello etc. I got certified as a full stack developper.

title: Developper Full Stack
description: I started my career as a intern full stack developper at Kati360. I worked on 4 projects. I was in charge of the front-end and back-end development of the projects. I also worked on the database design of the projects.
